Name: Solent Sunset
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A naval style tropical rum punch for those occasional hot sunny days on the Solent (the stretch of sea which separates the Isle of Wight from mainland Britain).
Nutrition: One serving of Solent Sunset contains 251 calories
